entry.title: Wyatt's 4th Birthday Questions
entry.summary: <dl class="docutils"> <dt>What is your favorite color?</dt> <dd>Red</dd> <dt>What is your favorite toy?</dt> <dd>Fire Truck</dd> <dt>What is your favorite fruit?</dt> <dd>Banana</dd> <dt>What is your favorite tv show?</dt> <dd>Bob the Builder</dd> <dt>What is your favorite song?</dt> <dd>Jingle Bell Rock and In the Jungle</dd> <dt>What is your favorite food?</dt> <dd>Fettuccine Alfredo</dd> <dt>What is your favorite outfit?</dt> <dd>PJs - Bear Brushing His Teeth</dd> <dt>What is your favorite game?</dt> <dd>Angry Birds</dd> <dt>What is your favorite snack?</dt> <dd>Wyatt Bars (Kids Cliff Bars)</dd> <dt>What is your favorite animal?</dt> <dd>Goat, moose, and deer</dd> <dt>What is your favorite book?</dt> <dd>Fire Truck Book</dd> <dt>What is your favorite outside activity?</dt> <dd>Play at the playground</dd> <dt>What is your favorite dring?</dt> <dd>Orange Juice</dd> <dt>What is your favorite holiday?</dt> <dd>Christmas</dd> <dt>What do you want to be when you grow up?</dt> <dd>Just want to be a Wyatt</dd> </dl>
